subject: Cannot reset my password
description: I have tried resetting my password three times but the reset email never arrives. I checked my spam folder and it is not there either.

subject: Double charged for subscription
description: My credit card was charged twice for the January billing cycle. I can see both charges on my bank statement dated January 3rd.

subject: Dashboard charts not loading
description: The analytics dashboard shows a spinning loader indefinitely. All other pages work fine but the charts on the main dashboard never render.

subject: Request for dark mode
description: It would be great if the application supported a dark mode theme. Working late at night with the bright white interface causes eye strain.

subject: Export to CSV produces empty file
description: When I click Export to CSV on the reports page, the downloaded file is 0 bytes. This started happening after the last update on Friday.

subject: API rate limit too restrictive
description: Our integration is hitting the 100 requests per minute rate limit during peak hours. We need a higher threshold to support our workflow.

subject: Two-factor authentication not sending SMS
description: I am unable to log in because the two-factor SMS code is not being delivered to my phone number ending in 4821.

subject: Mobile app crashes on upload
description: The app crashes every time I try to upload an image larger than 5MB from my phone gallery. Smaller images upload without any issue.

subject: Requesting invoice for tax purposes
description: I need a formal invoice with VAT details for all charges in Q4 2024. Our accounting department requires this for the annual tax filing.

subject: Webhook payloads missing timestamp field
description: Since the v2.3 API update, the webhook payloads no longer include the created_at timestamp field. Our downstream systems depend on this field for ordering events.

subject: Need to transfer account ownership
description: I am leaving the company and need to transfer ownership of our team account to my colleague David Park. How do I initiate this process?

subject: Page layout broken on tablet
description: The settings page overlaps and is unreadable when viewed on my iPad in landscape mode. The sidebar covers the main content area completely.

subject: Charge after cancellation
description: I cancelled my subscription on December 15th but was still charged on January 1st. I have the cancellation confirmation email as proof.

subject: Bulk import failing silently
description: When I upload a CSV with more than 500 rows to the bulk import tool, it shows success but only the first 500 records actually appear in the system.

subject: Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions
description: It would save a lot of time if there were keyboard shortcuts for actions like save, next ticket, and assign. I process hundreds of items daily.

subject: Slow page load times
description: Every page takes between 8 and 12 seconds to load over the past week. My internet connection is fine and other websites load normally.

subject: Cannot change profile picture
description: The profile picture upload button does not respond when clicked. I have tried both JPEG and PNG formats in Chrome and Firefox with the same result.

subject: SSO login loop
description: When I try to log in via our company SSO, the page redirects back to the login screen repeatedly. The browser shows a redirect loop error after several attempts.

subject: Question about enterprise pricing
description: We are evaluating your platform for a team of 200 users. Could you provide details on volume discounts and what is included in the enterprise tier?

subject: Notification emails arriving late
description: Alert notification emails are arriving 2 to 3 hours after the triggering event. We rely on these for time-sensitive incident response and the delay is causing missed SLAs.
